name: 节奏带师
description:
This game is free to play, you can experience the full twelve levels
[Game description]
In this light-hearted adventure game, you'll need to help GC Lady defeat the boss by completing a variety of levels! Explore the various modes and make sure you defeat the boss before the strawberries return to 0!
◆Each level is played differently
◆Includes touching items, picking things up, dialogue options, eliminating dropped objects, shooting battles, card battles, puzzles and other gameplay
◆Cute pixel style
◆Strawberries will be lost when the level challenge is failed, and strawberries are equal to life value and the final score settlement

You will help GC Lady! Complete the challenge by playing in different levels in different ways.
From left and right touch to dodge the pigeon, and then shoot, there are twelve kinds of levels to experience.

【Game start】
At the beginning of the game, you will have 5 strawberries, which will be your HP to play this game.
When 5 strawberries are deducted, the game ends and the total score is calculated.


[Button Tips]
Each level will have action tips before starting, please follow the action tips to play.


[Game Objective]
Get as high a score as possible at the end of the level.


[Extra points]
Some of the levels have an extra point race setting. When the time set for the level is met, the extra point race will be opened to challenge for a higher score.


【Gameplay Explanation ①】
In this level, when an apple falls in the blue triangle, press and hold A or D on the keyboard to eliminate it, otherwise an apple will be deducted
When the score exceeds twenty points, no strawberry (HP) will be deducted.


【Game play explanation②】
Long press and drag the GC lady to keep the GC lady from being touched by the pigeon. Hold on for more than 30 seconds to win!
Otherwise you will deduct one strawberry (HP)


【Playing explanation ③】
Keyboard A or D to dodge the GC ball, space to attack the GC ball.
Fail when life value is 0, deduct one strawberry (HP)


[more levels to play please explore through the button prompts]

[Character Introduction]
GC Lady
In the game you will help GC Lady to avoid danger and defeat the boss!


GC Ball
In-game boss, source unknown


Goo Goo Goo
The divine beast with the power of the dove seems to be hinting at something
